TopicTitle: Get Kerbal Space Program for 33% Off at Gamefly Digital

Articles.Content:
<p><a href="http://bit.ly/1ihHs6O"><img alt="image" src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/1664fe590a9175646815db3f23bb7085/tumblr_inline_n0a9nzn2CX1rr2wit.png"/></a></p>

<p>Need a cheap way into space? Get <em><strong>Kerbal Space Program</strong></em> for <strong>33% off</strong> in <strong>Gamefly Digital</strong>'s Early Access Sale!

<p>LINK: <a href="http://bit.ly/1ihHs6O"><strong><a href="http://bit.ly/1ihHs6O">http://bit.ly/1ihHs6O</a></strong></a></p>

Edited February 5, 2014 by Rowsdower

Mucho Gracias

An online acquaintance mentioned KSP in the passing and I grabbed the demo 2 days ago found the forum and this offer. It also combined with their Feb 20% discount for a massive 50% off. Well what can I say, I joined steam just for this. A great great game I just can't put it down.

Having a blast working my way through all the tuts, thanks community
